group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Everyone accepting the genetic test was adequately informed and signed a consent form. The study was approved by the ethics committee of Fuwai Hospital (Approval No. 2017-877) and adhered to the Declaration of Helsinki.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Everyone accepting the genetic test signed a consent form and agreed to allow their anonymized samples and genetic results to be used for further research studies and publications.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
